title: Habitaciones cerradas
overview: Melodrama set in two periods, the present and the first decades of the 20th century, centered on the history of a powerful family in Barcelona. Violeta Lax, the granddaughter of Amadeo Lax, a famous painter of the early 20th century, travels to Barcelona to supervise the remodeling of an old mansion that will become a museum dedicated to her grandfather. But the appearance of a mummified body in a secret room will lead Violeta to discover the dark past of her family. Hidden enigmas that will serve you to learn more about Teresa Brus√©s, her grandmother and, above all, to decipher the most hidden and unknown face of her revered grandfather. In the house of the Lax a pact of silence was imposed for a long time: Amadeo demanded that no member of his family ever remember the name or destiny of the wife who abandoned him just at the time of the Civil War.
